file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 49-11-01-06 - APU COWLING AIR INTAKES/OFFTAKES - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL APU COWLING AIR INTAKES/OFFTAKES - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH APU T-62T-40C11 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the visual inspection of the APU and starter-generator air intake and exhaust ducts. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY APU AND STARTER-GENERATOR AIR IN- FOR AIRCRAFT WITH 49-11-01-200-801-A ♦ TAKE AND EXHAUST DUCTS - INSPEC- APU T-62T-40C11 TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 49-11-01 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 49-11-01-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: FOR AIRCRAFT WITH APU T-62T-40C11 2. APU AND STARTER-GENERATOR AIR INTAKE AND EXHAUST DUCTS - INSPECTION A. General (1) Obey the instructions below to inspect the APU and starter-generator air intake and exhaust ducts. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 49-00-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 313 APU cowling D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Workstand To get access to the APU 1 F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task On the engine I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the left power control and distribution box, open the APU GEN START circuit breaker and attach DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it. (2) Put the work stand in the work area. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 49-11-01 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Inspect (Visual Inspection) APU and Starter-Generator Air Intake and Exhaust Ducts for Foreign Material or Obstruction (Figure 601) SUBTASK 212-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN AMM MPP 49-00-00/200 TO PREVENT INJURY TO PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO THE MATERIAL. (1) Do a visual inspection of the APU and starter-generator air intake and exhaust ducts to make sure that there is no unwanted matter or blockage. Remove the unwanted matter or blockage if applicable. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) On the left power control and distribution box, remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag and close the APU GEN START circuit breaker. (2) Remove the work stand from the work area. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 49-11-01 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
